sentences.sentence: There were blacksmiths tanners dyers and weavers.
sentences.translation: 有铁匠、制革工、染匠和织布工。

sentences.sentence: We are in the area of the dyers, one of the most picturesque and photographed parts of the city.
sentences.translation: 这里是染工房，它是城市里最独特、最具有艺术美感的地方。

sentences.sentence: Conditional word can send fur clothing cleaners and dyers clean glazing also can buy proper motion of leather brightening agent to be fur clothing glazing from the shop.
sentences.translation: 有条件的话，可送皮衣洗染店清洁上光，也可以从商店购买皮革光亮剂自行为皮衣上光。
